home.title_description_text: I like to craft solid and scalable products with great user experiences.
home.highly_skilled_description: Highly skilled at progressive enhancement, design systems & UI Engineering.
home.proven_experience_description: Proven experience building successful products for clients across several countries.

values.tailored_designs_description: Forget cookie-cutter templates! Your business is one of a kind, and your apps should be too.
values.cross_platform_reach_description: Why stay limited? Launch your app on multiple platforms and reach a bigger audience.
values.built_in_analytics_description: Stay in the know! Get actionable insights on visitor behavior to fine-tune your strategies.
values.accessibility_first_description: ADA-compliant designs that welcome everyone, including users with disabilities.
values.multilingual_multinational_description: Expand your reach beyond borders—your app is built to speak the world's languages.

about.why_choose_me_description: No shortcuts, just custom code crafted for your unique needs. From visually captivating websites to innovative mobile apps, I’m here to bring your vision to life with creativity and precision.
about.my_story_description: What started as a passion for creating websites and apps has grown into a commitment to building custom digital solutions across industries. I’ve developed a full-stack skillset, from front-end design to back-end systems and server management. Today, I’m dedicated to transforming unique ideas into impactful digital experiences that connect with audiences.
about.partner_with_me_description: Let’s build standout digital solutions together. I’m committed to collaboration and continuous improvement, whether you’re a startup or a large enterprise. Together, we’ll create digital experiences that truly connect with your audience.

contact.send_me_a_message_description: Got a question or proposal, or just want to say hello? Go ahead.
contact.textarea_placeholder: Hi, I think we need a design system for our products at Company X. How soon can you hop on to discuss this?
contact.are_you_a_fellow_developer_title: Are you a fellow developer? Welcome!
contact.are_you_a_fellow_developer_description: There’s a spot for you here too. Stay tuned—our blog on web development tips and tricks is launching soon!
